website_summaries.verdict: Easy-to-open cash box that works well for meetings and sales; an efficient way to keep  money organized.
pros: Removable tray has space for change and to organize bills efficiently
Model comes in several sizes to meet differing needs
Includes a built-in keyed lock and comes with 2 keys
cons: This model does not have any way to hold the coins or bills secure if it gets knocked on its side

customer_reviews.title: Great Cash Box to keep in your home
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this cash box, it's not too big not too small, even has a place at the top to properly store coins. The only downfall to this particular cash box, is that while it does lock, the lock can be easily "picked" so I suggest putting it somewhere no one would check to look for it. Also it doesn't have the option to "lift up" the cash drawer (as others do) so I have to keep my $100 bill underneath my $20's. That isn't a big deal however. I would recommend this cash box to anyone looking to use it to save money at home vs putting it in the bank (such as myself)
customer_reviews.author: Ava G

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: Wish I would have returned it but it wasn't used until it was to late. What sold us were the good reviews and the fact that the bills were held in place so wind couldn't send money flying. *The bill holders flip down easily on their own when you are taking bills out. *You can only hold a few bills because the hold downs get in the way *the latch is a joke. Picking it up by the handle has resulted in the lid popping open and everything dumping out.
customer_reviews.author: Brian J. Moser

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Quality- Great For Petty Cash...But We Don't Recommend If Using As a Cash Register..
customer_reviews.text: The case itself is really nice quality. We don't like the latch. It's a little hard to open with two hands and impossible to open with one hand. Which I normally wouldn't mind if we were using it as a storage box for petty cash etc.. But we use it at food and beer festivals more like a till so it's getting opened and closed constantly. And we often have customers money in one hand already.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonPrimeUser1313

customer_reviews.title: It's great because it has bill slots
customer_reviews.text: It's really big. Probably bigger than you think. It's a bit unwieldy, but I bet I could drive a truck over this thing without a dent. It's great because it has bill slots, enough for 20, 10, 5, and 1 with an extra for checks. Under the cash tray is AMPLE storage. I found the little clasp hard to work at first, but I finally got used to it. And since the handles are on the side it doesn't really have that same "pops open while you're carrying it" risk that other cashboxes use. We use it in our cub scout meetings.
customer_reviews.author: M. WUNDERLICH

customer_reviews.title: Budget friendly cash box that's great for an occasional craft fair or similar
customer_reviews.text: Budget friendly cash box that's great for an occasional craft fair or similar. It certainly wouldn't keep any sort of determined thief out of it but that's not what I purchased it for. So long as your expectations are for a well built metal container to hold money, and not for theft protection, you will be pleased. I could fit a receipt book across the bottom so long as it was in the middle and it didn't block the arms for the 2nd tier. There's not a lot of extra room though if you have things other than the money to go in there.
customer_reviews.author: mckenziedrums

customer_reviews.title: It works but there are some downsides....
customer_reviews.text: It's okay, BUT... the downsides of this product: The coins fall out when transporting if you don't hold it perfectly upright. Lengthwise, the dollar bill slots are very narrow, bills fit in a bit too snugly. Because the length of the bill slots are small, sometime you have to 'push' the bills under the clip and then they get 'pinched' by the clip, making it easy to tear a bill if you pull to remove it. The bill clips are stiff, I've used my box only 4 times and one of the clips that hold the bills have already come off. This box fits the purpose (until I find something else) but could be designed better.
customer_reviews.author: LTY

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, Sturdy, Portable
customer_reviews.text: I have a craft show business and I needed something to keep my cash organized a professional looking. The Steelmaster totally fits the bill (pun intended) for me. Very few cash boxes have 4 bill drawers, which I was looking for, plus space behind the bills for extra cash, checks, pens, or even my cell phone. The handy 5 compartment top drawer is perfect for coins, or credit card swipe attachments. Very sturdy, well made heavy duty construction, and a keyed lock make this a great purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Not delivered on time. Purchased for a Girl Scouts troop to keep money sorted at booths. One of the brackets for the bill clips is slightly bent causing the money clip in that slot to not work properly. I do like that it has a quick lock for carrying purposes without locking the whole box...but I bought a sentry cash box at Walmart for a second troop, that was much cheaper, about the same weight, but the bill clips work. That one doesn’t have the quick lock though. This one is overpriced at $30 for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Cash!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a cheap cashbox for an upcoming yard sale. I was in a hurry and the local Walmart was out of stock. I decided to order one on Prime and hoped it would arrive on time. This cash box is cheap. Like so cheap the top doesn't close properly and you have to force it close. The keys are also very flimsy and had broken off inside the lock. I needed something for that day, so I ended up having to physically remove the lock and used it unlocked and broken. Sadly I wasn't able to return it, as the lock was removed by me (to get my cash out). Save your money or order a better quality item.
customer_reviews.author: TheGeekAmy

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: This works good, but it is cheaply made. I didn't need something too sturdy, and this didn't cost much. But like a lot of things you get what you pay for. It is lightweight so it won't take a beating, but it is good enough to sit on a table for our concession stand. If you need something a little more rugged, I wouldn't get this one. The tray works great too. I like that you can remove it and put larger bills and checks below.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kee

customer_reviews.title: poor design. To make matters worse
customer_reviews.text: Meh. Just received my cash box and have had a heck of a time trying to open and close the it. Using the key is even more frustrating, as the key just turns and turns without stopping, not signaling whether it is locked or not. It just turns and turns and turns. Simply put: poor design. To make matters worse, to open the box you have an itty bitty push lever that is a b to use. I can't imagine opening and closing this all day at the farmer's market. It would be awful. Going to spend the extra cash and get a box that is easier to open and close and that is not so dog gone cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Jodilyn Ottobre

customer_reviews.title: Durable and useful
customer_reviews.text: Extremely durable and useful! To open it is kind of tricky at first, but you'll get the hang of it after a few uses. My organization used this at a fundraising event and was sooo grateful for it. Tip: to avoid losing the keys (especially because of constant use of the cash box), get the ring (with the keys) onto a hair binder, place on your wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: When it comes to lock boxes, you get what you pay for. Alright for kids but not for any serious purposes.
customer_reviews.text: Its an alright little lock box. I can only assume it was intended to be use very lightly. When cycling the lock through its locked and unlocked positions, it periodically jams up where it feels like it could potentially break with any additional force. The usual solution was to fidget with the key until it was inserted in a way that the lock preferred (finicky little thing!). Also note this lock box is not constructed with stainless steal. I live in a more humid environment and the lock box's internal lock housing is already rusted after about 2 months of ownership
customer_reviews.author: Mephesto

customer_reviews.title: Works Well. Well-constructed.
customer_reviews.text: Love this box. Very thick metal. Bigger than I expected. Works very well. As for those who said the bills are too short in the drawer. Just lift them from the front-side of the bills, not from the front. I bought a dollar store plastic sheet which was designed as a cutting board to cover the change area so they won't fall out when you shut the case and tip it. Use piece of good quality electrical tape to keep it closed.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and value !
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 of these boxes. I’m happy with the look, design and functionality of both. They are perfect for a cash box for events we’ve been hosting. There’s enough room for money, large bills if you want to set aside, checks, my square reader etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B.

customer_reviews.title: Great cash box, lacks extra storage
customer_reviews.text: I love this cash box!! My old one would pop open when carried by the handle. This box doesnt need to locked to latch it and pick it up by the handle. The lid only raises 90 degrees, so customers can’t see the contents - my favorite feature. The cantilever coin tray is pretty cool. However, there isn’t much storage space compared to cash boxes with lift-out trays. It also is on the larger size as a cash box but still a huge step up in quality and reliability over my old one. I can’t wait to get a locking cable for this box.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Wagner

customer_reviews.title: A good kid's toy, otherwise not secure
customer_reviews.text: The keys and lock are terrible, they hardly work. If you are looking for a secure lockbox, this is not the one. It's like a toy. The black tray does not sit solid in it's space, it often falls down into the gap below. The 2 starts are superficial and just based on the way it looks - it feels and looks durable...even though it's not. So perhaps since the lock is so crappy you can fake people out by thinking it really is durable. hah! Short answer - Would NOT recommend unless it's for casual use...like your kid's lemonade stand or something. But not for any real uses like a secure petty cash fund or business use.
customer_reviews.author: missgubba

customer_reviews.title: Very good cash box
customer_reviews.text: Very good cash box, I would buy it again. The only thing I wish it had would be "fillet"ed inside front edges, to make it easier to pull the paper money up and out. I had to "pinch" the money to get it out instead of sliding it, unless it was (over) full.
customer_reviews.author: Peter A. Kazmir

customer_reviews.title: Broken latches.
customer_reviews.text: I like these boxes as they were the only ones I could find that separated the bills and had room for coins. Like others, I was a bit frustrated by the spring holding down the bills, but that was manageable. I have purchased nine of these for workers in our U-pick orchard. Five of them have closures that have failed (the spring has fallen out) and can no longer be closed securely -- when you pick them up by the handle, they open and all the money falls out, so each box has to be held with two hands. That creates a much less secure product!
customer_reviews.author: Anne L.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, lots of space for everything
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cash box to use for my Girl Scouts' cookie booth. This box is much larger than one we used previously, but it was really nice to have the four separate slots for the different denominations. It helped the girls easily make change for their customers. And the levers worked nicely to keep the bills in place despite a windy day. I liked the extra space behind the bills. I used it for receipts, a couple of pens and a calculator. The box seems very heavy duty and I like that there are 2 keys, because I am sure to lose one of them.
customer_reviews.author: Sara E. Rickman

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed. I have many different functions that I participate in where I'm collecting money, tickets, etc. I needed something to collect these things so I wouldn't lose my mind and be organized. I love this thing. I can collect all sorts of bills, coins, checks, etc. This is heavy duty. You can easily pay double for this in a big box/retail store. In fact, I went to a couple big box stores and did not see anything on this level in stock. And the boxes that were in stock were inferior and had the nerve to be the same price as this, if not more. This is certainly a great deal! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Vonnie

customer_reviews.title: REally disappointed after less than one year of light use
customer_reviews.text: I love the box and the feature BUT in 9 months, the cheap plastic clip in the front does not spring into the position. So when the box is picked up by the top handle it flies open. I called MFF Industries and they said sorry but the warranty is 60 days.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: We have 8 grandchildren and wanted to get them silver dollars for their birthdays and needed something for them to keep them in. My husband had a box similar to this one and we thought we would try it. They are great boxes and our grandchildren did like them and they are a perfect storage device.
customer_reviews.author: Pauline

customer_reviews.title: totally wrong dimensions on product description - lots of space wasted inside
customer_reviews.text: it's 3.5" high, not 3.2". won't fit in my drawer. the slots for currency are the EXACT size of US currency with absolutely no wiggle room. the clasp mechanism for the bills cuts into the space such that you won't be able to fit more than 15-20 bills per stack without it screwing up the spring. really badly designed, badly advertised, just bad in general.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy a better key system for it if it would make it ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't stay latched and the key mechanism already inop. I'd buy a better key system for it if it would make it stay closed while carrying. Not one of my better purchases from Amazon and you won't be happy if you're mobile because your money will be on the ground like mine was when I found out the latch quit latching
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great design, poor construction and durability
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Girl Scout troop to use at cookie booth sales. I loved the cantilever design. Unfortunately during our 3rd and final cookie booth one of my Brownies - a 2nd grader - pulled it open without releasing the latch and it no longer functions. Really, should a cash box be so flimsy that an 8 year old of average strength should be able to accidentally break into it? It broke after only 7 hours of use, on March 14, and was purchased on Feb 5 so my troop was ineligible for a refund. If a blizzard hadn't caused us to reschedule a booth sale, this would've broken inside the return window.
customer_reviews.author: Lori M

customer_reviews.title: Nice box, but requires a specific type of cable lock
customer_reviews.text: It's good all around, but just be aware that the way you can lock this with a cable requires specifically a laptop type lock - the kind with the two little prongs that insert into this TINY hole; You can't really use any other type of lock
customer_reviews.author: Chet

customer_reviews.title: NICE STEEL LOCKING CASH BOX
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife to use at a garage sale she was having. Any thing to help get it over with lol. It shipped fast prime and arrive in perfect new condition. The box is durable and well made and the plastic money separator holds plenty of change and cash. The lock works as it should. For the price it is a great buy, I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Hawkeyefanjustin

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I needed a metal box with a latch and key lock to store miscellaneous items such as my passport, insurance policies, etc. Although the box is on the flimsy side, and I had to make several adjustments to make the latch work, it does the job, and I would buy it again. If the box had a more sturdy construction, I would give it 5 stars. I considered a fire resistant box, but after reading that moisture could build up inside which could damage the contents, I decided against it. If a fire occurred, I would have more serious issues to deal with than any damage to the box contents.
customer_reviews.author: Jim S

customer_reviews.title: Best style cash box I've found
customer_reviews.text: The latch can be a little tricky but other than that it's a good option for a small business. Slot in the back for checks and large bills is handy, as well as the change tray coming up and not having to manually remove it to get to the cash. Also appreciate that you don't have to open the box fully exposed to get to the items like in some other styles. Springs are very tight so they can crash down if you don't lower them slowly. Highly recommend for anyone who cannot accommodate a register drawer.
customer_reviews.author: RLW

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have bought two of these in the last year for my shop. The first one I ordered is great. It was exactly what I excpected; sturdy, not heavy, and the compartments fit money perfectly. I use it all the time! Have not had a single problem with it. The second one I received was defective. There is something wrong with where the key should go and it is impossible to lock, unlock or even open due to the defect. I would have returned it but I missed the window of time alluded for returns. Although on the bright side it makes an excellent paper weight.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Olcott

customer_reviews.title: Don't last as long as I'd like
customer_reviews.text: I have had several of these boxes and none have lasted for more than a year. Typically its the locking mechanism that gives out and falls apart. I do have one that still locks but the handle fell apart. I had 5 over the last two years. Looking to change over to something new that will last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Bea Sims

customer_reviews.title: Good product, works well
customer_reviews.text: The product works well but I thought it came with a wire to tie it up, but it did not. Furthermore the actual locking mechanism is made with plastic and could easily be pried open. We ended up screwing it to the wooden desk(most screws will go straight through the metal). Overall the old saying goes, keep an honest man honest.
customer_reviews.author: MrPat

customer_reviews.title: Nice, roomy cash drawer
customer_reviews.text: A great weighted cash drawer. I have seen the updated styles that have a cover for the coins. That is one thing I wish I would have noticed myself as movement of the box will spill the coins. That is my only “If only”, otherwise, nice size, can be locked, if desired.
customer_reviews.author: Shanlin

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, great box!
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with this. I had ordered one without a latch about a year ago and it was making me crazy always coming open! So I went back to the drawing board and this was perfect. I don't need my bills separated at craft shows, but I DO need the dang thing to stay closed while hauling it about. This is light, stays shut, and just what I wanted. Agreed that the lock isn't awesome, but that was not what I was after. I don't think a lock is of much concern if someone nabs your cash box it hardly matters what tiny lock it has.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I used this when I am vending for my small business. It's secure and holds money well. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great money organizer, just don't count on the lock!
customer_reviews.text: This box does what it needs, holds money. I use it for Girl Scout cookie booth sales. Within a few weeks of using it, the plastic locking mechanism no longer locked. What I mean by that is when you lock this thing, the plastic piece that locks isn't really long enough, so you can still open the box while its locked. In fact, I cannot hold this thing by the handle because it just pops right open. The metal is sturdy, the metal clasps and spring are really study (be careful a finger doesn't get snapped), but that locking mechanism won't even keep the box closed, let alone locked.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I had a smaller cash box for my very small business, but this box is so much better! Pockets for all my coins, slots for all the bills I use, space to store my credit card reader, and a latch which holds the box closed even when unlocked. I do put the coins in little baggies which can be closed so that the coins don't dump out and scatter when the box is stored sideways in the duffel bag I use to transport it.
customer_reviews.author: RJR

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy metal cash box
customer_reviews.text: nice metal money box with plastic insert for coins and bills..My grandson has become interested in money.. Lol...So I purchased this for him to keep his coins and dollar bills that he collects...it is also big enough to store other treasures as the plastic money tray is easily removed and lots of room inside...He loves that he can lock it up..but even with out locking it the closure lock is nice and secure..Great item for all uses.
customer_reviews.author: MARY

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: We have bought one of these for each of our kids. They love the lock feature and I like how it organizes the money so nicely. I was surprised at how heavy and sturdy the box was. My kids have really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Tee Slack

customer_reviews.title: Nice storage under cash box!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cash box. It replaced an old cash box I’d purchased 15 years ago. What I love the most is the deep storage under the cash tray. In addition to cash, it allows me to store some of my coin collection in the belly of the container. It’s more durable than the last one, so I expect it to last at least 15 more years.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent price and product!
customer_reviews.text: Does the job very well. A+ for durability and design. Not sure about security, may be easy to break into if you have the right tools and use a good amount of force.. but its expected. Nonetheless great product
customer_reviews.author: Xavier

customer_reviews.title: Short on Cash?
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately the cash slots aren't deep enough for a clean closure, when you flip the spring-loaded bill holder, the bills want to curl-up at the back of the slot. The result is not an easy exchange of bills, but rather a lumbering, methodical process. I'm pretty serious about keeping my cash orderly, this means no folds or crimps, but eventually every bill in this box gets curled up o the backside. As a basic design flaw, I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KeylimeSteve

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: I can't get key to work to lock it, but it is a nice heavy and roomy cash box. Luckily I don't leave the box unattended so the fact that the key didn't work is no big deal for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Great way to organize money for mobile businesses
customer_reviews.text: A big hit for the workers of the farmers markets. Organized money is much better than a wad in the pocket. Faster change for the customer. Only thing is that half way thru the season and the lid latch is broken. Cannot use top handle to carry box. Must hold lid closed by hand only.
customer_reviews.author: mustangmike

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to donate to my Rotary club. We had been borrowing cash boxes from different places and it was time we had our own. It is large and secure. It makes cash management on the day of a fundraiser so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: GREAT LOCKBOX, BUT MINE HAD MINOR ALIGNMENT ISSUES.
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A GOOD LOCKBOX WITH PLENTY OF ROOM FOR VALUABLES. UNFORTUNATELY, THE LID ON MINE WAS DIFFICULT TO CLOSE, DUE TO MISALIGNMENT. I WAS NOT EVEN ABLE TO CHECK THE LOCK TO SEE IF IT WORKS, SO I QUICKLY RETURNED IT AND BOUGHT THE ONE WITH THE DISC TUMBLER LOCK, WHICH I HAVE LEARNED, IS BETTER AND MORE SECURE.
customer_reviews.author: DTodd

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be missing something. . .
customer_reviews.text: I can't find keys any where! The plastic push button doesn't hold the box closed. Is there supposed to be a spring on it? I'm not a happy camper right now!
customer_reviews.author: Celia

customer_reviews.title: Good yard sale cash box
customer_reviews.text: The box served the purpose I needed it for but it was not the greatest quality. The alignment was off when opening and cloaing causing it to stick. I would buy again. The price was good for the quality. Makes for a great yard sale cash box.
customer_reviews.author: Keira

customer_reviews.title: Latched, locks, change goes everywhere
customer_reviews.text: It did it’s job, latched and locked good. Only thing is the change goes flying everywhere in the box. I was hoping the change would stay in the slots while carrying it. Secure box as long as its latched and locked
customer_reviews.author: A. Stand

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift + Practical Too!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my twins as birthday gifts ... to teach them to save their money!! It's also great to use if you're ever doing a yard sale or something where you need to collect money and give change back. The compartments make organizing your money easy!!
customer_reviews.author: tissabell

customer_reviews.title: Almost a good cash box
customer_reviews.text: This cash box is well made but a poor design (in my opinion). It works okay if you have a small amount of bills. I typically have over 50 bills in each category and the slot for bills is too short and the bills don't fit under the spring clips. If the spring loaded clips were moved back about 1/2 an inch, this would be a very good cash box. As it is, I ended up pulling out the spring clips so I could get all my bills in each sections. It was very difficult getting bar out that holds the spring clips in, thus my comment about a very well made cash box.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: latch broke
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this about 2 years ago. I use it about 3 times a year for Girl Scout purposes. So I have used it no more than 6 times. I liked the fact that I could close the lid and it latched without locking it each time. Unfortunately the plastic part that latches the lid broke. Now I cannot close the lid, nor lock it. It is useless to me now. Amazon - could you send a replacement??
customer_reviews.author: sgum

customer_reviews.title: Make sure keys work!
customer_reviews.text: Well, i was happy at first. I never locked it while at home but then did a vendor event and the key that came with it somehow locked it but wouldnt unlock it! So i tried for hours to get it open as it held my money captive. I ended up having to break it to open it up, 7 days after the return deadline!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Dented
customer_reviews.text: I received item in timely matter... outside shipping box was fine...commercial product box for item fine...item dented and scuffed, lid was on slightly crooked...as if it had fallen off a shelf within the store? I was able to bend the front of the lid back into place, still working on fixing the hinge on the back of the lid...hopefully I can fix that myself. I think the product will work great once I get the metal and hinge corrected. Wish it hadn't been scuffed and damaged. Haven't used it yet to say whether the item is good.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great box
customer_reviews.text: Nice, secure box! Perfect for what I needed but it does open easiest if you use 2 hands. I love the coin tray and the arms that hold the money down.
customer_reviews.author: KDV

customer_reviews.title: Cash Box for fundraisers
customer_reviews.text: The cash box worked great for my Girl Scout Cookie Booths. The girls were able to manage the cash and money was not every where. The only down side to this cash box is that the mechanism for the lock is made of plastic and several times when opening and closing it was not very secure and is the only part made of plastic. It held up though. I wish the mechanism for the lock was more durable. I am able to use it again.
customer_reviews.author: M. R. of WI

customer_reviews.title: Nice Box but Not Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, roomy cash box but I found two things to be quite irritating: (1) The paper bills do not come out of the tray easily. They get hung up on the front part of the cash box; (2) It is extremely difficult for me to open the lid when I need to access my cash. I am forced to hold the lid slightly open with an object to keep it from closing to eliminate this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Thanks 😝
customer_reviews.text: WAS in love with this box....now it's falling apart. The springs keep coming undone and the metal catches holding the clips down are bending. This is very aggravating since I work doing prepay events. Now I need a new box and i bought this in nov. Lasted 3 months. Very dissatisfied
customer_reviews.author: CatDogBird16

customer_reviews.title: Worked PERFECTLY for me! Very happy!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for our huge yard sale, where we made $2,000.00! No idea why some people have said it's too short for the bills? Everything was the perfect length! Took a little getting used to for opening it, but after a little, I found it easy!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle R

customer_reviews.title: Great safe.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to hold all my money in place. Haven't had any issues with this safe, and find it to be very sturdy and built well. Very durable. I would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Evan's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Good cash box
customer_reviews.text: We have used these same boxes purchased about 15 years ago and liked them so well we decided to add a few more. The boxes are the same quality as years ago. We like the hinged lid that doesn't fold all the way back thus making the cash less obvious to the person standing in front of you to pay for their purchase. The only problem was trying to get the adhesive from the tape off the box. There were two spots - one on the top and one on the front that even gave GooGone trouble.
customer_reviews.author: HandyDandy

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: These are really sturdy cases, but if you're not careful the clips that hold the money down will snap your fingers off!
customer_reviews.author: Shireen

customer_reviews.title: Secure and Organized!
customer_reviews.text: Cash box for yard sale initially. Secure and organized container for maintaining cash at home or while RVing!
customer_reviews.author: Honest T

customer_reviews.title: Cheap insides
customer_reviews.text: The button mechanism is made of plastic and won't keep the box from opening when you pick it up. The button has already started to move around and barley hanging in the hole.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Despain

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty! Holds bills in windy conditions!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this cash box for a couple years. I selected this product because of the spring loaded clips that hold the bills in place. I am a vendor that often has an outdoor booth and I wanted to make sure the bills would not blow out of the box when opened. The clips are very strong and the bills don't move in the slightest!
customer_reviews.author: Gingerbeer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Build! But needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: Pros: - Solid build - Best product design compared to competition - Product doesnt look cheap - Not too small/big, Its just thr right size Cons: - The latch used to hold bills in place could be improved so that its not taking up so much space. - Seems like it can only hold 10-15 bills per slot because of the latch.
customer_reviews.author: Jhon Lacaba

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and good features, but cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: The cash box is a nice size and has great features, but the problem is the money doesn't fit in the slots so it tends to catch in the back where the hinge is and sometimes tears it if there is a nice stack built up. I have also had to return a few of them I purchased as they have broken - the front latch will no longer hold it closed. Possibly consider a different box if you will be opening and closing it multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: Busy mom

customer_reviews.title: Gotta spend money to make money
customer_reviews.text: It's maybe a little pricey, but beats dealing with pulling out cash at the Farmer's Market from my fanny pack! Keeps all the coins/bills nicely organized and the spring loaded clips keep the cash from flying away!
customer_reviews.author: Yvette C.

customer_reviews.title: which is good in away
customer_reviews.text: it's really hard to open, which is good in away, at least someone can't try to take money out of it without you noticing. You have to push the button in & try to open the lid at the same time, which can't be done with one hand. Doesn't fit more than $20 in $1 so that's also a bit of a pain. And if you put too much money in it the bills tend to get stuck at the back. The metal parts that hold the bills down are also spring loaded so watch your hands LOL
customer_reviews.author: Nina Bolen

customer_reviews.title: Nice design
customer_reviews.text: The lid is a little hard to open, mostly because the handle is in the center of the lid so that the contents can be carried flat and the coins don't fall out of the trays. It's a bit of a struggle to push the button in and lift the lid at the same time because you don't get enough strength by lifting the center. Otherwise, its a great cash box. Love all the coin and currency slots. Has room in the back tray for checks, paper clips, etc. Two keys provided for locking.
customer_reviews.author: KiMBeRLy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Money Box
customer_reviews.text: This is a great money box, we have used it several times now with no issues. I agree with a former review that the clasp is a bit tough to open when you are in a hurry - you have to push and pull at the same time, but other than that, the money box worked great for our needs. The box is heavy, and has more compartments that I needed, but it was so nice to have the metal clasps holding the money in place. They can be loud when you drop them into place, so be prepared! Don't scare your customers. :-)
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Look Elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Item is just OK...Not very good quality and lock and key will not work. It is just about as bad as Amazon Customer service! Just there for looks and absolutely no redeeming value at all! One of the worst Customer Service dept in any business!!
customer_reviews.author: Camaro Dude

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: Well-made product. Keeps bills in place. The only negative is that if you’re moving the box around a lot, the walls between the coins aren’t tall enough. The coins end up spilling out into the main container. If the box will be stationary though, great!
customer_reviews.author: Chris b

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy, tricky lock
customer_reviews.text: Lock is barely functional, which pretty much defeats the purpose of a locked cash box. Tricky to lock and unlock--key only locks/unlocks when lined up a specific way, but can be inserted and turned incorrectly without actually doing anything so very easy to accidentally leave it unlocked. So flimsy it could easily be picked/broken. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: LYNN-at-work

customer_reviews.title: Not very secure or well made.
customer_reviews.text: In fairness it was really cheap I basically received what I paid for. However one should consider this more as a privacy box not to keep valuables in its not very secure I could probably pop it open with a screwdriver in less than 10 seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Hybred18

customer_reviews.title: This is a very sturdy heavy box
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy heavy box. It’s great if you’ll be doing a lot of money exchanges. Unfortunately I was wanting as a way to store my savings and each slot doesn’t hold very much money. I was able to get approx $1,500 in each slot so this isn’t for you if you are only wanting to store money.
customer_reviews.author: Brytni

customer_reviews.title: Coins fall out of box
customer_reviews.text: This box does not close tight. If tipped over the coins fall right out. It's also a pain to open by the button. It's not possible to open with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: veronica daw

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for events/portability
customer_reviews.text: for a small event stand where you want to replace aprons with cashboxes, this does the trick and the price is right as well. I can stuff a good amount of bills in each slot and it stays secured.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful box. Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful box. Sturdy, used everyday for 5 weeks and didn't have a problem with it. I would recommend this cash box to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy top, awful key/lock, but it does what it suppose to
customer_reviews.text: While I use it for storing something other then cash and coins, I have to say this little box is nothing special. The top is a little flimsy, the key is so simple, I think this box can be open with a knife, but as long as someone who would want to break into it is not aware of this fact, it is a small storage that keeps your stuff away from the sight of others.
customer_reviews.author: Kate G

customer_reviews.title: 3 years and it still is GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in 2012 and three years later it is still going strong! We do events for our business and need to make sure bills are secure and in place - keeps coins separated. the little tray behind bills keeps the counterfiet pen, our "deposit only" stamp and extra business cards. A few of the other business people have been impressed and bought it too. After three years I am impressed with it still.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for my rummage sale. It was a bit windy and the metal money hold downs really helped keep everything in place when I was making change. Sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: lionness

customer_reviews.title: My only complaint is that the key hole for the key is not easy to get the key in because the center potion ...
customer_reviews.text: The size of the box is exceptional. It allows plenty of room for cash bags and other materials related to fund raising events. My only complaint is that the key hole for the key is not easy to get the key in because the center potion turns creating an alignment problem.
customer_reviews.author: JGE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect locking cash box for shows!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and sturdy cash box- perfect for craft shows. Great design. Heavy enough to be stable without being too large and bulky. Comes with 2 keys. Really like this box and highly recommend. I purchased it based on a Pinterest review.
customer_reviews.author: Annacabana

customer_reviews.title: High quality & reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: So far, I love it. High quality! I'd bought a few cash boxes from local office stores & they ran $20-40 & still wasn't what I really wanted which was to have the coins AND the cash bills IN the bottom tray. I also wanted it to be sturdy, and NOT use a combo lock but a key lock AND NOT have it be a crummy cheap key either. This fits the bill! (No pun intended.) I also like that I CAN attach a security cord if I wish to...
customer_reviews.author: AvidReviewer3739

customer_reviews.title: nice money box
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife to use at craft fairs, she likes the box a lot it looks nice, seems sturdy, the fact that it has spring loaded bill stays is nice. The only reason for 4 stars is because the bill slots are a hair short not a big problem and if you have a lot of change in the change area and are walking fast it falls down into the cash area. Over all a good buy, does what it's supposed to. We would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: California Doberman

customer_reviews.title: Messed up
customer_reviews.text: I have several of these and had no issues regarding quality. This latest order proved otherwise with a warped lid and poorly attached latches that won’t allow the user to latch and lock the unit. Normally a good unit for the money except this time.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyan A. Steele

customer_reviews.title: happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Nice cash box but hard to open. Needs an extra handle or something to hold on to in order to push the release button. Other than that it's good. Update: Added a handle to make it easy to open.
customer_reviews.author: JoK

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy box, but very difficult to open!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this box which will be used on a weekly basis for fundraising event at school. This box is soo difficult to open! You're supposed to be able to press the button in the front, but you really have to press it very hard. This makes it very inconvenient to close between transactions. I would also add that the bill area is a bit to short to comfortably hold the bills in place.
customer_reviews.author: JenoftheSea

customer_reviews.title: Came with keys locked inside?
customer_reviews.text: What TF people? Leave the keys to the safe outside the safe before you lock it. This is first day stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch M

customer_reviews.title: Great Cash Box!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for my annual garage sale we have. The box was perfect! It was exactly what I was looking for. There was a little difficulty opening once it latched but if you think about it, that is a good thing because then you know it will stay closed. We closed the top lightly and it stayed unlatched so we could quickly open again when we needed change. Comes with 2 keys to lock the box.
customer_reviews.author: LassyGurl

customer_reviews.title: not the best thing to happen when your rushing to put money ...
customer_reviews.text: the steel master is ok, the ledges that hold the money come out when you lift them up and down . So when your in a rush lifting them to out money in they come out of there holders, not the best thing to happen when your rushing to put money in. I wouldn't buy again cause after a few times of it happening it gets very annoying trying to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: annlex23

customer_reviews.title: Great price for an effective cash box
customer_reviews.text: Used this at school for a fund raising archery tournament. It is built sturdy and worked superbly. The spring loaded bill holders kept the money in place and secured and also provided enough slots for the different amounts that we had to deal with. Great price for an effective cash box.
customer_reviews.author: Happy in Ky

customer_reviews.title: to each their own
customer_reviews.text: so i kept it. i like the steel, but hate the design. don't like the way the top ray works and how hard it is to use the slot underneath. kept it becasue the replacement i got i love the design but it's not as sturdy. so i use them both
customer_reviews.author: Shammer

customer_reviews.title: Good cash box
customer_reviews.text: Good cash box, but do t leave coins loose when traveling with the box.
customer_reviews.author: Sabine P

customer_reviews.title: the tabs will snap down on your hands which is pretty painful, and there are no safeguards against the ...
customer_reviews.text: The springs will catch bills and can tear them if you're not careful, the tabs will snap down on your hands which is pretty painful, and there are no safeguards against the change cups spilling which makes it hard to carry the case along with anything else, which is sometimes necessary at shows, so it's kind of a pain. The lock is a joke, but it's a nice looking heavy weight, professional looking item.
customer_reviews.author: C R Schwarz

customer_reviews.title: A little hard to open. You have to hold ...
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to open. You have to hold it with one hand, then push the black button, while opening the box. If you don't hold the box with the other hand, it tips, and moves. I will figure out a way to stabilize it.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Love this drawer, it’s well made and works great for our events. My only complaint is that the change compartment does not go flush against the top when closed, so change falls out all over the bills if you have to carry the box.
customer_reviews.author: Decisivedesign

customer_reviews.title: I have used this once. Two of the levers ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this once. Two of the levers that hold the money down broke, with only lifting up a couple of times. And when closed coins fall out if not flat while carrying.
customer_reviews.author: Chino

product_meta.title: STEELMASTER Cash Slot Security Box, 11.81"L x 9.84"W x 3.62"H (2216119G2)
product_meta.description: Style:Keyed Lock| Size:11.8"L x 9.5"W x 3.2"HIdeal for petty cash, this security box features an innovative, under-tray cash slot design for fast, secure placement of high-value currency, checks and credit card receipts. Durable, steel security box features rounded corners and includes a seven-compartment, removable plastic tray. Recessed handle folds for easy storage. Convenient, push-button catch/release keeps lid closed. Secure cam lock with two keys. Security box also features a security slot in the back of box for an added, optional security cable (not included) to prevent theft.
feature_bullets: Under tray cash slot for storage of large denomination bills
Convenient push-button release keeps lid closed, even when unlocked
Exclusive MMF STEELMASTER design US Patent D677,855

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,627 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
